title: The Perfect Home - Res Lease in Austin. 2 Beds, 2 Baths
posting_body: Spacious, private, perfect floor plan in an unbeatable location within Travis Heights, just one block off South Congress.
Walkable to fabulous and fun South Congress dining and shopping and just a stone's throw to downtown!
This end unit features granite counters and high quality durable wood-like laminate and tile floors.
Generous bedrooms and bathrooms, abundant closet and built-in space.

Private patio, separate utility room with full sized washer/dryer connections, wood-burning fireplace, exterior storage closet and an open floor plan with bedrooms at opposite ends of the unit for ultimate privacy.
Thoughtful design, built to superior condominium quality specifications to minimize noise.
Ample parking, two separate grassy areas for outdoor enjoyment.
No through traffic on this quiet residential street.
Two minutes to HEB, easy access to the Blunn Creek trail, Lady Bird Lake, Zilker, 290, I-35, 360, Mopac and Lamar.
You will LOVE this beautiful space and fantastic location!
**Pictures reflect a similar unit with the same floor-plan.
There may be minor differences between the unit depicted and unit 105.
